text: Stephen Anthony Smith (born October 14, 1967) is an American sports television personality, radio host and journalist. He works for ESPN. He is a commentator on ESPN's First Take. He is also an analyst for EPSN's SportsCenter and NBA Countdown. Smith was born in the Bronx, New York City. He grew up in Hollis, Queens. His parents were from Saint Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American sports commentators Category:People from the Bronx Category:People from Queens
title: Stephen A. Smith
